fields.name: ENABLE_LINREG
fields.description: Control bit to enable the regulator output.

fields.name: ENABLE_BO
fields.description: Control bit to enable the brownout circuitry in the regulator.

fields.name: ENABLE_ILIMIT
fields.description: Control bit to enable the current-limit circuitry in the regulator.

fields.name: ENABLE_PULLDOWN
fields.description: Control bit to enable the pull-down circuitry in the regulator

fields.name: BO_OFFSET
fields.description: Control bits to adjust the regulator brownout offset voltage in 25mV steps

fields.name: OUTPUT_TRG
fields.description: Control bits to adjust the regulator output voltage

fields.name: BO_VDD1P1
fields.description: Status bit that signals when a brownout is detected on the regulator output.

fields.name: OK_VDD1P1
fields.description: Status bit that signals when the regulator output is ok. 1 = regulator output > brownout target

fields.name: ENABLE_WEAK_LINREG
fields.description: Enables the weak 1p1 regulator

fields.name: SELREF_WEAK_LINREG
fields.description: Selects the source for the reference voltage of the weak 1p1 regulator.

fields.description: Control bit to enable the regulator output.

fields.name: OK_VDD1P1
fields.description: Status bit that signals when the regulator output is ok. 1 = regulator output > brownout target

fields.name: ENABLE_LINREG
fields.description: Control bit to enable the regulator output to be set by the programmed target voltage setting and internal bandgap reference

fields.name: ENABLE_BO
fields.description: Control bit to enable the brownout circuitry in the regulator.

fields.name: ENABLE_ILIMIT
fields.description: Control bit to enable the current-limit circuitry in the regulator.

fields.name: BO_OFFSET
fields.description: Control bits to adjust the regulator brownout offset voltage in 25mV steps

fields.name: VBUS_SEL
fields.description: Select input voltage source for LDO_3P0 from either USB_OTG1_VBUS or USB_OTG2_VBUS

fields.name: OUTPUT_TRG
fields.description: Control bits to adjust the regulator output voltage

fields.name: BO_VDD3P0
fields.description: Status bit that signals when a brownout is detected on the regulator output.

fields.name: OK_VDD3P0
fields.description: Status bit that signals when the regulator output is ok. 1 = regulator output > brownout target

fields.name: REG0_TARG
fields.description: This field defines the target voltage for the Arm core power domain

enumeratedValues.name: REG0_TARG_31
enumeratedValues.description: Power FET switched full on. No regulation.

fields.name: REG0_ADJ
fields.description: This bit field defines the adjustment bits to calibrate the target value of Reg0. The adjustment is applied on top on any adjustment applied to the global reference in the misc0 register.

fields.name: REG1_TARG
fields.description: This bit field defines the target voltage for the vpu/gpu power domain. Single bit increments reflect 25mV core voltage steps. Not all steps will make sense to use either because of input supply limitations or load operation.

enumeratedValues.name: REG1_TARG_31
enumeratedValues.description: Power FET switched full on. No regulation.

fields.name: REG1_ADJ
fields.description: This bit field defines the adjustment bits to calibrate the target value of Reg1. The adjustment is applied on top on any adjustment applied to the global reference in the misc0 register.

fields.name: REG2_TARG
fields.description: This field defines the target voltage for the SOC power domain

enumeratedValues.name: REG2_TARG_31
enumeratedValues.description: Power FET switched full on. No regulation.

fields.name: REG2_ADJ
fields.description: This bit field defines the adjustment bits to calibrate the target value of Reg2. The adjustment is applied on top on any adjustment applied to the global reference in the misc0 register.

fields.name: RAMP_RATE
fields.description: Regulator voltage ramp rate.

fields.name: FET_ODRIVE
fields.description: If set, increases the gate drive on power gating FETs to reduce leakage in the off state

fields.name: REFTOP_PWD
fields.description: Control bit to power-down the analog bandgap reference circuitry

fields.name: REFTOP_PWDVBGUP
fields.description: Control bit to power down the VBG-up detection circuitry in the analog bandgap.

fields.name: REFTOP_LOWPOWER
fields.description: Control bit to enable the low-power mode in the analog bandgap.

fields.name: REFTOP_SELFBIASOFF
fields.description: Control bit to disable the self-bias circuit in the analog bandgap

enumeratedValues.name: REFTOP_SELFBIASOFF_0
enumeratedValues.description: Uses coarse bias currents for startup

enumeratedValues.name: REFTOP_SELFBIASOFF_1
enumeratedValues.description: Uses bandgap-based bias currents for best performance.

fields.name: REFTOP_VBGADJ
fields.description: no description available

fields.name: REFTOP_VBGUP
fields.description: Status bit that signals the analog bandgap voltage is up and stable. 1 - Stable.

fields.name: STOP_MODE_CONFIG
fields.description: Configure the analog behavior in stop mode.

fields.name: DISCON_HIGH_SNVS
fields.description: This bit controls a switch from VDD_HIGH_IN to VDD_SNVS_IN.

fields.name: OSC_I
fields.description: This field determines the bias current in the 24MHz oscillator

fields.name: OSC_XTALOK
fields.description: Status bit that signals that the output of the 24-MHz crystal oscillator is stable

fields.name: OSC_XTALOK_EN
fields.description: This bit enables the detector that signals when the 24MHz crystal oscillator is stable

fields.name: CLKGATE_CTRL
fields.description: This bit allows disabling the clock gate (always ungated) for the xtal 24MHz clock that clocks the digital logic in the analog block

enumeratedValues.name: ALLOW_AUTO_GATE
enumeratedValues.description: Allow the logic to automatically gate the clock when the XTAL is powered down.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_AUTO_GATE
enumeratedValues.description: Prevent the logic from ever gating off the clock.

fields.name: CLKGATE_DELAY
fields.description: This field specifies the delay between powering up the XTAL 24MHz clock and releasing the clock to the digital logic inside the analog block

fields.name: RTC_XTAL_SOURCE
fields.description: This field indicates which chip source is being used for the rtc clock.

fields.name: XTAL_24M_PWD
fields.description: This field powers down the 24M crystal oscillator if set true.

fields.name: VID_PLL_PREDIV
fields.description: Predivider for the source clock of the PLL's.

fields.name: LVDS1_CLK_SEL
fields.description: This field selects the clk to be routed to anaclk1/1b.Not related to PMU.

fields.name: LVDS2_CLK_SEL
fields.description: This field selects the clk to be routed to anaclk2/2b.Not related to PMU.

fields.name: LVDSCLK1_OBEN
fields.description: This enables the LVDS output buffer for anaclk1/1b

fields.name: LVDSCLK2_OBEN
fields.description: This enables the LVDS output buffer for anaclk2/2b

fields.name: LVDSCLK1_IBEN
fields.description: This enables the LVDS input buffer for anaclk1/1b

fields.name: LVDSCLK2_IBEN
fields.description: This enables the LVDS input buffer for anaclk2/2b

fields.name: PFD_480_AUTOGATE_EN
fields.description: This enables a feature that will clkgate (reset) all PFD_480 clocks anytime the USB1_PLL_480 is unlocked or powered off

fields.name: PFD_528_AUTOGATE_EN
fields.description: This enables a feature that will clkgate (reset) all PFD_528 clocks anytime the PLL_528 is unlocked or powered off

fields.name: IRQ_TEMPPANIC
fields.description: This status bit is set to one when the temperature sensor panic interrupt asserts for a panic high temperature

fields.name: IRQ_TEMPLOW
fields.description: This status bit is set to one when the temperature sensor low interrupt asserts for low temperature

fields.name: IRQ_TEMPHIGH
fields.description: This status bit is set to one when the temperature sensor high interrupt asserts for high temperature

fields.name: IRQ_ANA_BO
fields.description: This status bit is set to one when when any of the analog regulator brownout interrupts assert

fields.name: IRQ_DIG_BO
fields.description: This status bit is set to one when when any of the digital regulator brownout interrupts assert

fields.name: LVDS1_CLK_SEL
fields.description: This field selects the clk to be routed to anaclk1/1b.Not related to PMU.

fields.name: LVDS2_CLK_SEL
fields.description: This field selects the clk to be routed to anaclk2/2b.Not related to PMU.

fields.name: REG0_BO_OFFSET
fields.description: This field defines the brown out voltage offset for the CORE power domain

fields.name: REG0_BO_STATUS
fields.description: Reg0 brownout status bit.

enumeratedValues.name: REG0_BO_STATUS_1
enumeratedValues.description: Brownout, supply is below target minus brownout offset.

fields.name: REG0_ENABLE_BO
fields.description: Enables the brownout detection.

fields.name: PLL3_disable
fields.description: Default value of "0"

fields.name: REG1_BO_OFFSET
fields.description: This field defines the brown out voltage offset for the xPU power domain

fields.name: REG1_BO_STATUS
fields.description: Reg1 brownout status bit.

enumeratedValues.name: REG1_BO_STATUS_1
enumeratedValues.description: Brownout, supply is below target minus brownout offset.

fields.name: REG1_ENABLE_BO
fields.description: Enables the brownout detection.

fields.name: AUDIO_DIV_LSB
fields.description: LSB of Post-divider for Audio PLL

fields.name: REG2_BO_OFFSET
fields.description: This field defines the brown out voltage offset for the xPU power domain

fields.name: REG2_BO_STATUS
fields.description: Reg2 brownout status bit.

fields.name: REG2_ENABLE_BO
fields.description: Enables the brownout detection.

fields.name: REG2_OK
fields.description: Signals that the voltage is above the brownout level for the SOC supply

fields.name: AUDIO_DIV_MSB
fields.description: MSB of Post-divider for Audio PLL

fields.name: REG0_STEP_TIME
fields.description: Number of clock periods (24MHz clock).

fields.name: REG1_STEP_TIME
fields.description: Number of clock periods (24MHz clock).

fields.name: REG2_STEP_TIME
fields.description: Number of clock periods (24MHz clock).

fields.name: VIDEO_DIV
fields.description: Post-divider for video
